name: Pokécheck BloodRed (DARK)
description:
Pokécheck is a website which allows you to upload your Pokémon to the Internet for viewing their stats and sharing with others. Like most websites, its default theme is black text on a white background, so I have decided to reverse this and make it white text on a dark background.

All versions are now up to 2.8, which will be the precursor to an all-themes-included version 3.0.

There are three remixes available: style 59703, style 59704, and style 59987.
additional_info:
Changelog:
2.8 - Cleanup, added account options
2.3 - Updated FAQ to match class, skinned Pokécheck ad for "headless" display
2.2 - Fixed header for most deposited stats
2.1 - Skinned the FAQ
2.0 - Added styles for sprites subdomain
1.59 - Added new sprite classes
1.58 - Added border definition to betawarning
1.57 - Minor tweaks and added no-remix warning comments
1.56 - Tweaked link colors to improve visibility
1.55 - Added element to markings div and search/userinfo separators
1.54 - Skinned sprite page (awaiting class declarations from Xfr)
1.53 - Minor tweaks to match new classes on the main site, styled button/submit inputs
1.52 - Added password input to text input theme
1.51 - Changed dropdowns to match theme in addition to generational backgrounds
1.5 - Expanded global elements to color all inputs (including checkboxes)
1.4 - Themed public view elements
1.31 - Colored the queue message goldenrod
1.3 - Added hover elements to lists of Pokémon, changed all inputs to match theme style
1.2 - Fixed private message background
1.1 - Fixed legality analysis
1.0 - Initial release (uses Xfr's improved CSS classes)
.1 - Pilot release

CSS code is © M.andrew 2012. You may modify the theme for personal use and distribute it (or derivative works), but you may not charge payment for these works.
Credit goes to Pokécheck user Invictus for the use of his shiny Haxorus in the screenshot.
